alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 10 at 9:26PM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM MST WEDNESDAY THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Huerfano county and Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet. * WHEN...From 7 AM MST Wednesday through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * Additional details...Significant amounts of blowing dust will be possible due to the strong northwest winds.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
